description: Adds a deployment to a pipeline stage to a control or module repository in a Continuous Delivery for PE workspace.

email.description: The email address associated with the account.

password.description: The password associated with the account.

workspace.description: Designates the workspace that the repo and pipeline are associated with

repo_type.description: The type of repository. Currently only supports module repositories

pipeline_id.description: The id associated with the pipeline to add a stage to.

pe_creds_name.description: The name of the PE credentials used to look up the node group.

node_group_name.description: The name of the node group to use for the deployment.

stage_name.description: The name of the stage that the job should be added to. The stage will be created if it doesn't exist.

add_stage_after.description: Optional. The name of the stage that we should add a new stage after. If not specified then the stage will be added to the end of the pipeline. Only applies if the stage doesn't exist

autopromote.description: Optional. A boolean to indicate whether or not changes should be auto-promoted through this stage. The default value is false. Will update the existing settings on a stage if set.

trigger_condition.description: Optional. The condition on which changes will promote to the next stage. This parameter is only applicable if 'autopromote' is set to true.

resolvable_hostname.description: Optional. A resolvable internet address where the Continuous Delivery for PE server can be reached. Required only if the agent certificate is not the machine's resolvable internet address.

web_ui_endpoint.description: Optional. The endpoint where the web UI can be reached, in the form http://<resolvable_hostname>:<port>. Required if you set the web_ui_port parameter in the cd4pe class during installation.
